work.name: eJad
summary: Optimized BMW's Symphony tool performance in large-scale projects by tuning JVM parameters, wisely choosing the garbage collector, and continuous refactoring, increasing throughput by 19% using Eclipse RCP, SWT, Jface, and Xtend.

Built a multi-threaded, simple-designed, enterprise code generator that automates the process of generating C files from XML files using Java/J2EE and Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF), which boosted the development process time by 30%.
Implemented a robust VS Code extension for Symphony modeling language using Xtext and language server protocol.
Improved the java-classes obfuscation rate by 34% using Proguard to deceive the de-compilation process.
Managed BMW's Symphony Infrastructure (CI/CD) using Python, ZUUL, Ansible, Bazel, and Jenkins in a Scrum workflow, resulting in a resilient workflow and a 15% efficiency increase.
Mentored over 4 senior students on extending the functionality of our code generator through their graduation project.

work.name: Robotech
summary: Led the control team to develop a reliable, latency-free, real-time control system for a mini-submarine, receiving recognition for design ideas and implementation.
Developed a dashboard with various control functionalities using C++ and Qt as a cross-platform application.
Transferred the control system to ROS, which improved system latency to around 1 ms.

work.name: Innovation Hub
summary: Automated mapping of architecture's maquettes to a 3D grid layout by building a Maquettes Mapper GUI that reduced the average time needed to map a medium-sized project from 20 minutes down to 4 minutes using Python and Qt.
Re-introduced the design of the physical interactive maquette board, which decreased the cost by 76%.

projects.name: Log4j2
projects.description: Made occasional contributions to Apache Log4j, which is an efficient logging API and backend for Java-based projects.

projects.name: Equation Plotter
projects.description: Creator of a 2D mathematical equation plotter.

projects.name: Graduation Project
projects.description: Designed and built a generic deep-learning converter that translates the source code of Android apps to iOS apps' source code and vice versa using NMT.

projects.name: PongPing
projects.description: Developed a table tennis scoring system by processing the match live video.

projects.name: ASU Racing Team Website
projects.description: Implemented website's authorization component with a social login feature using Angular 6 and TypeScript. Provided a RESTful API using Django with relational databases.

projects.name: MemorySimulator
projects.description: Developed a GUI that simulates and visualizes memory allocation and deallocation; it supports different methods of allocation and deallocation Best fit, worst fit, and first fit.

projects.name: CareHub
projects.description: Created and put into use a healthcare system that lets patients access personal medical records, book appointments, and find the right health provider to get treatment.

publications.name: Neural Machine Based Mobile Applications Code Translation
